title: Pumpkin Omega-3 Loaf
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons milled linseed', '6 tablespoons water', '300g sugar', '250g pumpkin puree', '125g apple sauce', '165g plain flour', '40g wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves']
